Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it's worth more than $8000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it will bring to you, I am offering it to you for $9500. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique advantages and features that make this product an excellent investment for you. We're confident it will exceed your expectations and contribute significantly to your goals. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
